```{r libraries, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}

library(xml2)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}

xml <- read_xml("http://www.ggobi.org/book/data/australian-crabs.xml")

records <- xml_find_all(xml, "//record")

text <- xml_text(records)
text <- str_remove_all(text, "[\n]")

```
